issue.title: Adding new vector layers type : GeoJson & KML
issue.body:
**Original author :** Portier Thomas

In order to add ability to display vector layers in the map, there could be two new specific service type as Google, Bing or OSM : KML and GeoJSON.
For these types of layers, there will be a single field to fill by the administrator : the url of the file.

Actually, these new types of layers will have to be implemented in the MAP and the preview.
